commands.name: requirements
commands.command: source venv/bin/activate && pip freeze > requirements.txt && deactivate

commands.name: runserver
commands.command: source venv/bin/activate && python3 station_api/manage.py runserver && deactivate

commands.name: migrate
commands.command: source venv/bin/activate && python3 station_api/manage.py makemigrations && python3 station_api/manage.py migrate && deactivate
